title: YearOfHope
content:
Your continued support in 2020 can bring a lasting solution to the issues of homelessness and addiction.

In this post-holiday season, giving goes down, but the wintertime need for hot meals, warm beds, and safety is as great as ever.

Please help with an extra-generous gift today. Your gift could lead someone out of homelessness and addiction into a truly transformed life in our recovery programs!
